name: WD Watch
description: Pipravili jsme pro Vs jedinenou mobiln aplikaci pro chytr hodinky, kter ve spojen s mobilnm telefonem a GPS jednotkou ve vozidle poskytuje okamit pehled o stavu vozidla.   Aplikace zobrazuje daje o vybranm vozidle: - SPZ - stav tachometru - idie - rychlost a aktuln pozici vozidla vetn monosti zobrazen na map - vzdlenost od vozidla  Aplikace umouje upozornit uivatele pi zmnch: - pi nastartovn a vypnut motoru - pi zmn polohy  Data v hodinkch jsou automaticky aktualizovna dle nastavenho intervalu od 1  30 min.  Aplikace je urena pro uivatele www.webdispecink.cz. Chytr hodinky komunikuj s mobilnm telefonem prostednictvm technologie Bluetooth. We have prepared for you a unique mobile application for smart watches, which in conjunction with a mobile phone and a GPS unit in the vehicle gives an instant overview of the status of the vehicle.  App displays information about the selected vehicle: - SPZ - Mileage - driver - Speed and current position of the vehicle including the ability to display on the map - Distance from the vehicle  Application allows you to notify users when updates: - When starting and stopping the engine - Changing the position of  Data in the watch are automatically updated according to the time interval from 1 to 30 min.  The application is designed for users www.webdispecink.cz. Smart watch that communicates with a mobile phone via Bluetooth.
